Package mavlc.context_analysis

Class ModuleEnvironment

java.lang.Object
mavlc.context_analysis.ModuleEnvironment
public class ModuleEnvironment extends Object
Module environment containing all functions and record types accessible in this module, i.e. all functions and record types defined in the module and all functions from the standard runtime environment.

  • Method Details

    • addFunction

      public void addFunction(Function function)
      Add a function to the set of functions defined in this module.
      Parameters:
      function - Function defined in this function.

    • getFunctionDeclaration

      public Function getFunctionDeclaration(String name)
      Get the function declaration (AST node) for the given function name. Throws an UndeclaredReferenceError if no function with the given name was defined in this module or the standard runtime environment.
      Parameters:
      name - Function name.
      Returns:
      The function declaration if a function with the given name is defined.

    • getFunctions

      public Collection<Function> getFunctions()

    • addRecordTypeDeclaration

      public void addRecordTypeDeclaration(RecordTypeDeclaration recordType)
      Add a record type to the set of record types defined in this module.
      Parameters:
      recordType - recordType defined in this record type.

    • getRecordTypeDeclaration

      public RecordTypeDeclaration getRecordTypeDeclaration(String name)
      Get the record type declaration (AST node) for the given record type name. Throws an UndeclaredReferenceError if no record type with the given name was defined in this module or the standard runtime environment.
      Parameters:
      name - recordType name.
      Returns:
      The record type declaration if a record type with the given name is defined.

    • getRecordTypeDeclarations

      public Collection<RecordTypeDeclaration> getRecordTypeDeclarations()
